title: 999 WINS!!! Anyone care to come celebrate my 1000th win with me???
body: I'm at 999 wins in normal queue. Would any Rioter or player care to join me in this milestone???

replies.body: 1000 WINS ACHIEVED!!! Thanks Sephyre and Maraudaur for joining us!! Was a great game.
gg dude! I think that Riven is still swinging at your shadow.
Glad to hear it. For someone who has played since Season 3, I'm doing terribly. Something like 220 normal wins to like 500 losses, after 3 years I thought I'd be doing a bit better.
Sweet! Just sent invite, hopefully to the right one
I would, but I'd probably make you lose...
